it.azraelsec.Protocol

Enum Commands

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Commands>
      • it.azraelsec.Protocol.Commands
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Commands>

    public enum Commands
extends java.lang.Enum<Commands>
    The Commands enumeration encapsulates all the commands that Client and Server will exchange between them via their main TCP connection.
    Author:
    Federico Gerardi, https://azraelsec.github.io/

        public static Commands[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (Commands c : Commands.values())
    System.out.println(c);
